Polar Bear



We later saw one of the bears make a classic dive from a rock into the pool, but unfortunately didn't have the camera ready.
Taken Monday, May 28, 2001, 01:27:18pm.  Original image size: 1600x1200, 1005kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/200s @ F3.5, ISO 100, 205mm
